body: This is why I fuccking love gender bender I wanna experience this so badly ಥ‿ಥ
this is so hot

I have waited 15 months for this translation

Since I discovered Kouji's stuff, and JK Refle 2 hinted that the next one was going to have a loli...

Then I found that the next one had come out, and wondered when someone would translate it...

A few months ago I learned that gender.tf was responsible for nearly all gender-bending hentai translations and they weren't going to touch this one because it was loli... I figured it would go untranslated forever for being so niche...

Imagine my surprise and delight upon searching for new kouji works today and seeing this!

1/

I had 'read' the original, and thought I had an idea of how it went: Creep thinking he was specifying his *partner* asks for a loli, then as with the others is shocked to find out what's going on until big girl licks new parts and he realizes he's really been changed. Of course, he falls for the store's pleasures, and comes back, receiving the same body as before (I assumed once a customer chose once, their female form was set.) He begs the guards to let him take the girl to a love hotel; they're concerned about letting someone who looks like a loli outside until he and big girl come up with the 'oh no my little sister wet herself' plan. He goofs around a bit then gets back to being bullied and pleasured by the big girls.

2/

I did not in a million years imagine that:
He ASKED to BE a loli, not to bang one
He WANTS to be even smaller
THAT'S what he's trying to bribe the guards for, nothing to do with sex acts! He wants his ideal form!
The karaoke isn't just playing around, he's *longed to sing these songs in a proper girl voice* and, in fact, despite being surrounded by three women who are surely willing not only to have sex with him but to yuri bulli in the store's unique way, *begs to be allowed to sing another half hour of songs* rather than asking 'so can we get to the sex already'!!
He eventually recognizes *exactly* how into all this he is and goes for it in a way the previous two guys didn't
We even get a use of "good girl"!

∞/10, a few points off for watersports and I thought I wasn't into giantesses but hmmm, and a few points off ∞ is still ∞.

*Damn*, Kouji, you knocked this one out of the park beyond my wildest dreams. How do you see into my psyche so?

3/3
